General.Name: Nanjing Develop Advanced Manufacturing Co Ltd
General.Description: Nanjing Develop Advanced Manufacturing Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and marketing of parts and components for oil and gas industry in China and internationally. The company offers surface equipment and Christmas tree components; subsea, fracturing, and drilling equipment components; and other products. Its products are used in deep water subsea drilling and production, shale gas fracturing, surface wellhead and Christmas tree, BOP, high pressure fluid transportation system, wind power, and nuclear power sectors. Nanjing Develop Advanced Manufacturing Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2009 and is based in Nanjing, China.
